statements: SELECT * FROM packaging_recycling_rate WHERE packaging_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT packaging_type, recycling_rate FROM packaging_recycling_rate WHERE recycling_rate >= 75.00;
SELECT packaging_type FROM packaging_recycling_rate ORDER BY packaging_type DESC;
SELECT MAX(recycling_rate) AS max_recycling_rate FROM packaging_recycling_rate;
SELECT AVG(recycling_rate) AS avg_recycling_rate FROM packaging_recycling_rate;
SELECT packaging_type, recycling_rate FROM packaging_recycling_rate WHERE recycling_rate > 50 ORDER BY packaging_type ASC
SELECT * FROM packaging_recycling_rate WHERE recycling_rate < 25 ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC
SELECT AVG(recycling_rate) AS avg_rate FROM packaging_recycling_rate WHERE packaging_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT packaging_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM packaging_recycling_rate GROUP BY packaging_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT packaging_type, recycling_rate FROM packaging_recycling_rate WHERE packaging_type = 'Glass' OR packaging_type = 'Paper' ORDER BY recycling_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, recycling_rate FROM packaging_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT bin_location FROM recycling_bins WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, recycling_rate FROM packaging_materials WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, recycling_rate FROM packaging_materials WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT bin_location, material_name FROM recycling_bins JOIN packaging_materials ON recycling_bins.material_id = packaging_materials.material_id;
SELECT DISTINCT material_name FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT bin_location, material_name, recycling_rate FROM packaging_materials JOIN recycling_bins ON packaging_materials.material_id = recycling_bins.material_id ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM PackagingTypes;
SELECT type_id, type_name, category FROM PackagingTypes ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, location, contact_person FROM CollectionSites WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT type_name, category, recycling_rate FROM PackagingTypes WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingRecords WHERE weight BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY pickup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PackagingTypes WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT type_name, category, recycling_rate FROM PackagingTypes WHERE category='Plastic';
SELECT site_name, location, contact_person FROM CollectionSites WHERE site_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY site_name DESC;

SELECT r.pickup_date, s.site_name, p.type_name, r.weight FROM RecyclingRecords r INNER JOIN CollectionSites s ON r.site_id=s.site_id INNER JOIN PackagingTypes p ON r.type_id=p.type_id WHERE r.weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingRecords WHERE pickup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM PackagingTypes;
SELECT id, type FROM PackagingTypes ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM RecyclingCompanies WHERE location='City';
SELECT company_id, AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM RecyclingRates GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT packaging_type_id, SUM(total_recycled_amount) AS total_recycled FROM RecyclingStats WHERE date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PackagingTypes ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM RecyclingCompanies WHERE location LIKE '%Europe%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT company_id, packaging_type_id, total_recycled_amount FROM RecyclingStats WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT rt.packaging_type_id, pt.type, rs.total_recycled_amount FROM RecyclingRates rt JOIN PackagingTypes pt ON rt.packaging_type_id = pt.id JOIN RecyclingStats rs ON rt.packaging_type_id = rs.packaging_type_id WHERE rs.total_bins_used > 100 ORDER BY rs.total_recycled_amount DESC;
SELECT rc.name AS CompanyName, rs.total_recycled_amount AS TotalRecycled FROM RecyclingCompanies rc JOIN RecyclingStats rs ON rc.id = rs.company_id WHERE rs.date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, recycling_category FROM packaging_materials WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT material_name, recycling_rate FROM packaging_materials WHERE recycling_category = 'Plastic';
SELECT center_name, contact_email FROM recycling_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT material_name, recycling_category FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT entry_id, material_id, center_id, date_added FROM packaging_database ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT stat_id, material_id, center_id, weight_collected, collection_date FROM recycling_stats WHERE weight_collected > 100 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, center_id, collection_day, collection_time FROM collection_schedule WHERE collection_day IN ('Monday', 'Wednesday', 'Friday') ORDER BY center_id;
